text: Yeroor is a village near Anchal, Kollam district, Kerala, India. == Politics == Yeroor is a part of Punalur assembly constituency in Kollam (Lok Sabha constituency). Shri. K. Raju is the current MLA of Punalur. Shri.N. K. Premachandran is the current member of parliament of Kollam. == References == Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Yeroor
